name: Advisor Performance
description: This dashboard displays the performance of financial advisors, focusing on key metrics such as assets under management, number of assets and clients, pipeline duration, and time spent in different stages of the client onboarding process.

kpis.name: Assets Under Management
kpis.description: Total assets under management for Bernelle Weatherhead, totaling £6.2M.

kpis.name: Number of Assets
kpis.description: Total number of assets managed by Bernelle Weatherhead, amounting to 18.

kpis.name: Number of Clients
kpis.description: Total number of clients managed by Bernelle Weatherhead, which is 11.

kpis.name: Average Pipeline Duration
kpis.description: Average time an asset spends in the pipeline for Bernelle Weatherhead, currently at 39.3 days.

kpis.name: Average Time in Stage
kpis.description: Average time spent in each stage of the client onboarding process for Bernelle Weatherhead is 7.5 days.  The average time across all stages is 7.5 days, compared to an overall average of 7.9 days.

kpis.name: SLA Completion
kpis.description: Percentage of Service Level Agreements completed, showing 84.6% complete and 15.4% incomplete.

name: Advisor Performance
description: This dashboard displays the performance of financial advisors, focusing on key metrics such as assets under management, number of assets and clients, pipeline duration, and time spent in various stages of the client onboarding process.

kpis.name: Assets Under Management
kpis.description: Total assets under management for Bernelle Weatherhead, amounting to £6.2M.

kpis.name: Number of Clients
kpis.description: Total number of clients managed by Bernelle Weatherhead, totaling 11.

kpis.name: Average Pipeline Duration
kpis.description: Average duration of assets in the pipeline for Bernelle Weatherhead, which is 39 days.

kpis.description: Service Level Agreement (SLA) completion rate, showing 84.6% complete and 15.4% incomplete.

name: ABC Corp Finance Dashboard
description: This dashboard provides a financial overview of ABC Corp, showing key performance indicators (KPIs) such as sales, profit margin, and discounts across different segments and regions.

kpis.name: Profit Margin %
kpis.description: The profit margin percentage, showing profitability. Values range from 7% to 22% across different months.

kpis.name: Sales Growth
kpis.description: Percentage increase in sales compared to the previous year (10%).

kpis.name: Sales
kpis.description: Total sales revenue for the period (143,796).

kpis.name: Discount %
kpis.description: Overall discount percentage applied to sales (21%).

kpis.name: Discount $
kpis.description: Overall discount amount in dollars (198,837).

kpis.name: Ach %
kpis.description: Achievement percentage against the target (109%).

kpis.name: Target
kpis.description: Target sales value (131,514).

kpis.name: Current Profit Margin
kpis.description: Current profit margin percentage (-35%).

kpis.name: Profit Growth
kpis.description: Percentage change in profit compared to the previous period (-6%).

kpis.name: Profit $
kpis.description: Total profit in dollars (15,824).
